TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WindowsFormsHost extends System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost implements class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 可讓您將 Windows Forms 控制項裝載於 WPF 頁面上的元素。

span.span: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用放置您 WPF 項目或頁面內的 Windows Form 控制項的項目。Use the element to place a Windows Forms control within your WPF element or page. 若要裝載 Windows Form 控制項或表單中的 WPF 項目，使用控制項。To host a WPF element in a Windows Forms control or form, use the control. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll 隨[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]組件。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 組件的預設位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 若要裝載 Windows Form 控制項中的 WPF 項目，您必須指派 Windows Form 控制項屬性。To host a Windows Forms control in a WPF element, you must assign the Windows Forms control to the property. 使用要指派自訂之間的對應內容項目和其裝載的 Windows Form 控制項。Use the property to assign custom mappings between a element and its hosted Windows Forms control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用項目以主機控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a element to host a control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 使用 xaml WPF 中將 Windows Form 控制項裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[HostingWfInWpfWithXaml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWfInWpfWithXaml/CSharp/HostingWfInWpf/Window1.xaml#1)]

A set to the background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 根據預設，這個屬性所對應更新和裝載控制項的屬性。By default, this property is mapped to update the and properties of the hosted control. 如需有關對應屬性，請參閱[Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information on mapping the property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ Child { System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定由 所裝載的子控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the element.

value.span: 裝載的 Windows Form 控制項。

span.span: The hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個子系控制項可以裝載，但可以有任意數目的子系。Only one child control can be hosted, but can have any number of children. 子控制項不能是最上層的表單。The child control cannot be a top-level form. 如果是，表單的屬性設定為`false`。If is a , the form's property is set to `false`. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage `<` *物件* `>``<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>``<` *hostedControl* `.../>` ```` ## XAML 值XAML Values *object**object* A元素 （或可能的子類別）。A element (or a possible subclass). *hostedControl**hostedControl* 指定裝載的 Windows Form 控制項的項目。An element that specifies the hosted Windows Forms control. 指定在標記中的自訂控制項通常需要 xmlns 對應，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要加入至裝載的控制項屬性項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to add the hosted control to the element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 在 WPF 中的 ActiveX 控制項裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/CSharp/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/VisualBasic/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.vb#11)]

summary.span: 從 WPF 以非強制回應的方式開啟 時，讓它可以正確運作。

span.span: Enables a to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以將所有轉送鍵盤訊息modelessly 開啟。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a is opened modelessly. 方法安裝的訊息篩選條件所需的非強制回應表單開啟 WPF 時正常運作。The method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by WPF. 您需要呼叫這個方法一次只為特定執行個體。You need to call this method only once for a particular instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定會影響其範本使用屬性做為參數的控制項。This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其不會影響其他控制項。It has no effect on other controls. 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 根據預設，這個屬性所對應更新裝載控制項的屬性。By default, this property is mapped to update the property of the hosted control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: The available size for the object.

summary.span: 覆寫 的基底類別實作，測量 物件的大小，然後傳回正確的大小給配置引擎。

span.span: Overrides the base class implementation of to measure the size of a object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
The desired size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WPF 版面配置的大小限制是硬式條件約束。Size constraints in WPF layout are hard constraints. 如果超過限制，主機必須裁剪的內容，裝載的區域內。If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region. 這個方法的實作會強制執行這項行為。The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法可能需要時已變更的上階元素的屬性，但的區域數值尚未變更的項目。Calling the method may be necessary when a property of an ancestor element has changed, but the local value of the element has not changed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: 取得屬性對應，以此判斷 項目上的設定屬性如何影響所裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。

span.span: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the element affects the hosted Windows Forms control.

value.span: A對應上裝載 Windows Form 控制項屬性的屬性。

span.span: A that maps properties to properties on the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 和 WPF 技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。The Windows Forms and WPF technologies have two similar but different property models. *屬性對應*支援兩種架構之間的互通性。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入的對應屬性控制項。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Vector ScaleChild(valuetype System.Windows.Vector newScale) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function ScaleChild (newScale As Vector) As Vector

span.span: The new scale factor.

summary.span: 縮放裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項，並且追蹤比例因素。

span.span: Scales the hosted Windows Forms control, and tracks the scale factor.

returns.span: ，代表套用到裝載之 Windows Forms 控制項的比例因素。

span.span: A which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 控制項不支援縮放為 WPF 項目相同的方式。Windows Forms controls do not support scaling in the same way as WPF elements. 比方說，調整 Windows Form 控制項從係數會是 1 至 0.5 的因數和回係數會是 1 不是，在一般情況下，復原原始控制項的大小。For example, scaling a Windows Forms control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WindowsFormsHost 元素的配置考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md)。For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md). 覆寫方法以提供裝載 Windows Form 控制項的自訂縮放比例的行為。Override the method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted Windows Forms control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定裝載控制項的定位點索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.

value.span: TAB 導覽和焦點的定位點索引。

span.span: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 使用這個屬性來變更索引標籤瀏覽表單上控制項之間的順序。Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form. 具有較低的定位點索引的控制項，會在索引較高的控制項之前的焦點。A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

Public Shared ReadOnly TabIndexProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 相依性屬性。

span.span: A that specifies the focus behavior.

summary.span: 將焦點從 WPF 轉送至裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。

span.span: Forwards focus from WPF to the hosted Windows Forms control.

returns.span: 如果已啟動控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a control was activated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目收到的索引標籤命令方法，控制在中的第一個符合資格接收焦點。When a element receives a TAB command from the method, the first eligible control in receives focus. 所指定的第一個控制項`request`參數。The first control is specified by the `request` parameter. 當`request`是，則行為是類似於按下 TAB 鍵。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key. 當`request`是，則行為是類似於按下 SHIFT + TAB。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr WndProc (IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam, ref bool handled);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int WndProc(native int hwnd, int32 msg, native int wParam, native int lParam, bool& handled) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function WndProc (hwnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wParam As IntPtr, lParam As IntPtr, ByRef handled As Boolean) As IntPtr
protected: override IntPtr WndProc(IntPtr hwnd, int msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam, bool % handled);

param.name: hwnd
param.span: 裝載之視窗的視窗控制代碼。

span.span: Window handle of the hosted window.
Message to act upon.

param.name: wParam
param.span: 可能與處理訊息相關的資訊。

span.span: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.

param.span: 這通常用來儲存較小的資訊，例如旗標。

span.span: This is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags.

param.name: lParam
param.span: 可能與處理訊息相關的資訊。

span.span: Information that may be relevant to handling the message.
This is typically used to reference an object.

param.name: handled
param.span: 事件產生是否應該標示已處理。

span.span: Whether events resulting should be marked handled.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，存取所裝載子視窗的視窗處理序。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, accesses the window process of the hosted child window.

returns.span: 子視窗的視窗控制代碼。

span.span: The window handle of the child window.
